data.persona: I work in the laundry.  I dislike my superior.  I sneeze at the smell of soap.
data.description:
You are in the Dining Hall.
The dining room holds a gleaming, gilded wooden table that can seat 100! There are gilded mirrors on the walls, and hundreds of candles, which are lit every night. There is a large handmade rug on the floor and tapestries lining the walls depicting past royalty.
There's a handmade rug, a mirror, a tapestry, and a candle here.
The king is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a tunic.

data.mid_motivation: I must humble myself in the King's presence
data.long_motivation: I am grateful for the King taking me in after a life of poverty and wish to keep my job at the Castle
